task.name: v.hull
task.description: Produces a 2D/3D convex hull for a given vector map.

parameter.name: input
parameter.label: Name of input vector map
parameter.description: Or data source for direct OGR access

parameter.name: layer
parameter.label: Layer number or name ('-1' for all layers)
parameter.description: A single vector map can be connected to multiple database tables. This number determines which table to use. When used with direct OGR access this is the layer name.

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: WHERE conditions of SQL statement without 'where' keyword

flag.name: f
flag.description: Create a 'flat' 2D hull even if the input is 3D points

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Allow output files to overwrite existing files
